channel.title: Vise-soft: looking to put togther a team
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]Vise-Soft[/size][/center]
[center][color=navy] We are looking to put togther a private server that is above the regular. Although the project is just begenning a new stage, becoming a "company", because i am only able to do so much and the time i can spend on it is so little that i would like to put togther a team to allow for more rapid groth and a much more diversely able server. we can start from a work of mine which is developed or we can begin from a new framework, it is up to the team. I would like to have it released in stages.[/center]
[center][size=16pt]current stage: PreStage [/center]
[center][size=13pt]Prestage goals:[/size] the first stage. (literally the begenning) [center]
[ul][li] gather a diverse and able team [/li]
[li] decided on future parts and updates [/li]
[li] begin. [/li][/ul]
[center][size=13pt]Genesis goals:[/size] the second stage. (literally the begenning) [center]
[ul][li] Make the base extremely efficient or use an efficient framework [/li]
[li] begin to build in basic features (trading, magic, fighting, pvp, ect.) [/li]
[li] have a basic client [/li]
[li] set up a high-scores and webclient [/li][/ul]
we will open the server after this stage building up our time on the server statuses so by the time we are completeing it we will beon the first page.
[center][size=13pt]Revelations goals:[/size] the third stage. (literally lots of change) [center] [i] Note this is the main stage of development making the server special![/i]
[ul][li] build in adavanced features voted on by the team(minigames, special magics, custom items, ect) [/li]
[li] make our own custom map; size and ect decided on later. [/li]
[li] advance the client [/li][/ul]
[center][size=13pt]Reign goals:[/size] the fourth stage. (literally uh... idk i just liked it) [center] [i] Note this is the stage where we do few developments mainly just economy restructuring[/i]
[ul][li] small updates(new minigames, quests ect.) [/li]
[li] perfect everything else [/li][/ul]
more stages later possibly!
[hr]
[hr]
[center][size=18pt]so if you feel like you want to be a part of this project please appily now![/size][/center]
so just make a repily following this Application:
[code] Name: Age: What You'd Like To Do: Your Experience: Form of Communication1 (preferably email): Form of Communication2: Ammount of time you can spend:
[/code]

item.title: Vise-soft: looking to put togther a team
item.dc:creator: @qw3rty qw3rty
item.description:
@qw3rty wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Vise-Soft[/size][/center]

[center][color=navy] We are looking to put togther a private server that is above the regular. Although the project is just begenning a new stage, becoming a “company”, because i am only able to do so much and the time i can spend on it is so little that i would like to put togther a team to allow for more rapid groth and a much more diversely able server. we can start from a work of mine which is developed or we can begin from a new framework, it is up to the team. I would like to have it released in stages.[/center]

[center][size=16pt]current stage: PreStage
[/center]

[center][size=13pt]Prestage goals:[/size]
the first stage.
(literally the begenning)
[center]

[ul][li] gather a diverse and able team
[/li]

[li] decided on future parts and updates
[/li]

[li] begin.
[/li][/ul]

[center][size=13pt]Genesis goals:[/size]
the second stage.
(literally the begenning)
[center]

[ul][li] Make the base extremely efficient or use an efficient framework
[/li]

[li] begin to build in basic features (trading, magic, fighting, pvp, ect.)
[/li]

[li] have a basic client
[/li]

[li] set up a high-scores and webclient
[/li][/ul]

we will open the server after this stage building up our time on the server statuses so by the time we are completeing it we will beon the first page.

[center][size=13pt]Revelations goals:[/size]
the third stage.
(literally lots of change)
[center]
Note this is the main stage of development making the server special!

[ul][li] build in adavanced features voted on by the team(minigames, special magics, custom items, ect)
[/li]

[li] make our own custom map; size and ect decided on later.
[/li]

[li] advance the client
[/li][/ul]

[center][size=13pt]Reign goals:[/size]
the fourth stage.
(literally uh… idk i just liked it)
[center]
Note this is the stage where we do few developments mainly just economy restructuring

[ul][li] small updates(new minigames, quests ect.)
[/li]

[li] perfect everything else
[/li][/ul]

more stages later possibly!

[hr]

[hr]

[center][size=18pt]so if you feel like you want to be a part of this project please appily now![/size][/center]

so just make a repily following this Application:

Name:
Age:
What You'd Like To Do:
Your Experience:
Form of Communication1 (preferably email):
Form of Communication2:
Ammount of time you can spend:

Read full topic
item.source: Vise-soft: looking to put togther a team
